errors.error_description: States that Briefcase requires Python 2.7 or higher, which is incorrect as modern Briefcase requires Python 3.8+ and Python 2.7 is deprecated
correction_candidates: Note: Briefcase requires Python 3.8 or higher.
Note: Briefcase requires Python 3.6 or higher for full functionality.
Note: Briefcase requires a modern Python version (3.8+).
errors.golden_answer: Note: Briefcase requires Python 3.8 or higher.
